GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19.6 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: fix nft_counters_enabled underflow at nf_tables_addchain()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 8bcad2a931313aeba076b76922d5813ef97d0a91, it was introduced in version v5.19.6 by commit 98a621ef45e3605c7487f7fa6fec7df94697d6a2. For more details please see the references link.
